Detailed Description

String class.

The char array contained by GString is always null-terminated

Member Function Documentation

◆ Format()

template<typename ... Args>
static std::string rev::GString::Format ( const std::string &  format,
Args ...  args 
)
inlinestatic

Format a std::string like a const char*.

Write to a char* using std;:snprintf and then convert to a std::string

Note
See https://stackoverflow.com/questions/2342162/stdstring-formatting-like-sprintf

inlinestatic

Reentrant version of string tokenization.

Parameters
[in]savePtrA pointer used to avoid a static char* in the implementation of strtok, must be passed as a reference to modify the original ptr
